data.name: Consumers
data.value: Consumers

data.name: ConsumersText
data.value: Have unified connection with producers of products that you use and consume in close proximity to you. Build green credits for future value.

data.name: Details001.1
data.value: A circular production systems app for suppliers, producers and consumers. Providing all the participants the information required to successfully complete the cycle end to end. Combining future production and healthy practices for you, your business, your customers, your supply chain and your world.

data.name: Details001.2
data.value: "Take the path of regenerating our planet... your journey will be rewarding indeed."

data.name: Details002.1
data.value: Producers existing or new, have the tools to prepare and plan production spaces in direct proportion to the demand for a finished product.

data.name: Details002.2
data.value: Consumers and end-users can now plan their demand with producers, looping the value chain as effectively as possible.

data.name: Details002.3
data.value: Suppliers of materials and services for producers, close the last leg of the loop for sustainable and regenerative practices, anywhere on the globe.

data.name: Details003
data.value: Plan, learn, produce, buy, sell or donate products. Wherever you are on our planet.

data.name: Details004.1
data.value: Register - Your personal data is yours alone

data.name: Details004.2
data.value: Choose your model - Production, Consumption, Supplies or all three

data.name: Details004.3
data.value: Plan your production or demand

data.name: Details004.4
data.value: Broadcast your business and engage with others

data.name: Details005.1
data.value: Registration made easy, one click authenticate via your existing social media account(s)

data.name: Details005.2
data.value: Just a note on data here. We're not interested in your personal data. The data we're collecting is the raw stuff that will help everyone in the SIF community.

data.name: Details005.3
data.value: By logging in you gain access to a rich plethora of real world, integration ready features and functions provided by SIF.

data.name: Greetings1
data.value: Source it Fresh, an open-source platform for all parties in the fresh consumable product cycle.

data.name: Greetings2
data.value: Enabling strong, carbon-conscious, and notable communities of producers, suppliers and consumers.

data.name: Heading001
data.value: Sensible - Intelligent - Fresh

data.name: Heading002
data.value: Does your future fit any of these cycles?

data.name: Heading003
data.value: Growing, preparing or producing something with a best use date is super-charged with Source it Fresh.

data.name: Heading004
data.value: How do I start with Source it Fresh?

data.name: Heading005
data.value: Effortless sign up / sign in

data.name: Producers
data.value: Producers

data.name: ProducersText
data.value: Boost your productivity, scale your business and fulfill your orders seamlessly. Be rewarded for your carbon-conscious methodology.

data.name: Suppliers
data.value: Suppliers

data.name: SuppliersText
data.value: Co-ordinate your supply business with minimal effort for all your Source it Fresh customers. Share in rewards for green credits and sustainable practices.

data.name: Title
data.value: Your business, only better..
